ehr_relevant_links.text: National E-Health Project with Bio-surveillance (Early Warning) System
MINISTRY OF HEALTH ENGAGES GMA AND FACILITY HEADS ON SYSTEMIC CHALLENGES IN HEALTHCARE

recommendations: Design EHR to support 3 facility types: hospital, clinic, health_center
Include templates/modules for common health issues: aids, maternal, hypertension, nutrition, immunization
Integrate SMS/phone communication features for patient engagement
Include email notifications and communication features
Implement offline-capable design for rural areas with poor connectivity
Include multilingual support (English, Twi, other local languages)
Ensure compliance with Ghana's data protection and health information policies
Design mobile-first interface for healthcare workers using smartphones
Include Mobile Money integration for billing (popular payment method in Ghana)
